Notes on Job Queue x
Note Send Message
To push data to a job queue, use the following code.

jobData = { action:'jobQueue', data: 'any object here'};

JOB = {
jobName: "Job name",
jobDesc: "Job Description",
data: jobData,
allowDuplicate: true,
clearOnDone: false,
lockUI: false
};

jobQueue.add(JOB);

The handlers name is 'jobQueue'.

Note JobQueue Button
To hide/show the jobqueue button, change the visible flag in the config.json to false/true.
To hide/show the jobqueue bubble, change the showBubble flag in the config.json to false/true.


"jobQueue" :
{
"visible" : false,
"maxJobs" : 0,
"jobLife" : 0,
"dataLife" : 0,
"showBubble" : false
},

Note Jobqueue Events
Goto to pubsub to for more information on the events.
